name: rollup-plugin-md-icon
description: Minify md icons and font in your app.

bring-builds.command: mkdir lib && find ../lib -type f ! \( -path '../lib/vite/*' -o -path '../lib/test/*' \) -print0 | xargs -0 cp --parents -t lib/

copy-all-symbols.#comment: this provides access to full symbols font for when dev'ing offline
